label: HomeAutomation Measurements
info:
Receive MQTT messages from sensors through HomeServer and mosquitto on raspberry.
Each SensorStation has several subtopics for the individual sensor measurements such as temp, humi. 
When homeserver founds a measurement erroneous it will send a 1 on topic ERR for that SensorStation.
The outgoing MQTT node controls the RemoteDisplay station. It can recieve measurements and will display it (currently fixed to temp and humi)

Versionen:
20200418    V1.1: geht soweit beginne Umstellung auf Switch in Function statt lauter MQTT Knoten

name: ValveCalculation

func:
switch (msg.payload.event){
    case "S":
        msg.payload = 
        {
    "mode": "color",
    "red": 255,
    "green": 255,
    "blue": 255,
    "gain": 100,
    "turn": "toggle",
    "transition": 500
}
        break;
    case "SS":
        msg.payload = 
                {
    "mode": "color",
    "red": 80,
    "green": 255,
    "blue": 255,
    "gain": 50,
    "turn": "on",
    "transition": 500
                }
        break;
    case "SSS":
        msg.payload = 
                {
    "mode": "color",
    "red": 255,
    "green": 255,
    "blue": 255,
    "gain": 100,
    "turn": "on",
    "transition": 100
}
        break;
    default:
        msg.payload = "anderes event"
}

return msg;
